solution_line_template: Since Zoe's grandma gave her some money toward her trip, she needs to come up with ${total_cost} - ${grandma_contribution} = $<<{total_cost}-{grandma_contribution}={remaining_cost}>>{remaining_cost}.
This means she must sell ${remaining_cost} / ${earnings_per_candy_bar}/candy bar = <<{remaining_cost}/{earnings_per_candy_bar}={candy_bars_needed}>>{candy_bars_needed} candy bars.
